oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Women's Army Auxiliary Corps advertisement front view, 1943 June
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lamb, Herman
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black-and-white photograph of Women's Army Auxiliary Corps billboard located in Chattanooga, Tennessee. The billboard in the image reads, "Uncle Sam Needs You! JOIN THE WAAC. APPLY U.S. ARMY RECRUITING STATION, 222 POST OFFICE BUILDING CHATTANOOGA TENN."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945
United States. Army. Women's Army Auxiliary Corps
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Soldiers in Chattanooga, Tennessee photographic prints and negatives, 1940-1945
